DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the results of the Becton Dickinson (BD) Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) Assay on the Viper LT instrument from Liquid-based cytology media diluted in HPV diluent to adjudicated histology results from biopsy.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of the HPV Assay on the BD Viper LT System With Cervical Specimens
DOC.criteria: Females who are >21 years of age Females who provide informed consent Known pregnant Cervical cytology specimen collected within the last 4 months Prior complete or partial hysterectomy involving removal of cervix Application of chemical compounds to the cervical area 24 hour prior to study entry acetic acid, iodine, spermicide, douche, or antifungal medications Conization, LEEP, cervical laser surgery or cryosurgery on the cervix has been performed in the last twelve months Enrolled in a cervical disease diagnostic trial since 2007.
